member.name: M:Ceiba.Application.Tests.Services.AutomatedReportServiceTests.CreateMockListSection(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a mock IConfigurationSection that simulates a list of strings. This is needed because Moq cannot mock extension methods like Get<T>(). The Get<List<string>>() extension method works by iterating GetChildren().
